name: Fierce Fields
description:
Made for Great Spring Game Jam (2022)

You are a farmer, and it's spring. You want to go to harvest your crops but you are allergic to pollen! Avoid the flowers and get the crops. 

The plots and crops are generated randomly. There are different types of flowers or enemies as well as a power up: the boots!

You have to get to these crops:

Collect them, and bring them back to the cart:

Controls:

  • Move: W A S D
  •  Attack: click
  • Interact: E
  • Pause: Escape
